abilitiesRevealed.description: Robin demonstrates a creative application of her Hana Hana no Mi powers by using sprouted hands to physically roll Luffy around the roller race track, compensating for his inability to skate.
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Shows the versatility of the Hana Hana no Mi beyond combat applications, demonstrating how it can be used for mobility assistance and creative problem-solving.

abilitiesRevealed.description: Robin uses her sprouted hands to hold Foxy's hands apart, preventing him from forming the gesture needed to activate his Noro Noro Beam.
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Demonstrates tactical combat application of the Hana Hana no Mi to neutralize Devil Fruit users by preventing them from activating their powers.

abilitiesRevealed.description: Foxy uses his Noro Noro Beam during the roller race to slow down opposing racers, demonstrating the use of his Devil Fruit powers in competitive events rather than just combat. The beam's thirty-second duration limitation is emphasized.
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Shows how Foxy applies his Devil Fruit abilities to non-combat competitive situations, and reinforces the strategic importance of understanding power limitations.
